document_data.mainbody:
uamogh was was one of the leaders of the Batiri Shattered Spear tribe in Samarach circa 1374 DR.
Cuamogh was one of the most intelligent and the strongest Batiri of her tribe. She eyes betrayed the womans intelligence, and, unlike her kin, she was willing to negotiate and make deals with outsiders.
Cuamoghs tribe was the sworn enemy of the neighboring Batiru Stone Knives tribe. At some point in or before , Stone Knives stole Shattered Spears namesake revered heirloom, and in retaliation, the Spears drove the Knives out of their home in the jungles of the Samarlogh. In the , a group of adventurers allied with a merchant from Samargol became involved in the Batiri conflict. Cuamogh was in possession of a priceless flawless gem that a merchant from Samargol desired, and the Batiri knew its value. She offered the gem in exchange for retrieval of her tribes heirloom - the broken spear, hidden away in an abandoned yuan-ti temple.
Cuamoghs fate and the outcome of the Bariri hostilities remained unrecorded, but it was known that by way of the artifacts retrieval or through slaughter, the adventures were able to retrieve Shattered Spear tribes flawless gem of the tiefling merchant Vadinya.
